price: ከተናዛዢም በኩል (ከውነት) መዘንበልን ወይም (ከሢሶ በመጨመር) ኃጢኣትን ያወቀና በመካከላቸው ያስታረቀ ሰው በእርሱ ላይ ኃጢኣት የለበትም፡፡ አላህ በጣም መሓሪ አዛኝ ነውና፡፡
arabic: فَمَنۡ خَافَ مِن مُّوصٖ جَنَفًا أَوۡ إِثۡمٗا فَأَصۡلَحَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ فَلَآ إِثۡمَ عَلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: faman khāfa min mūṣin janafan aw ith'man fa-aṣlaḥa baynahum falā ith'ma ʿalayhi inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
